name: SPECTRUM
description: Spectrum is a decentralized Online Shopping aims to deliver a smart contract-based protocol that supports a new era of efficient, transparent and secure e-commerce system. Spectrum is a smart contract protocol, aims to improve the e-commerce system with fundamental e-commerce technology for buyers and sellers by automating functions currently performed by ― middlemen‖ marketplaces like Amazon, eBay and Alibaba. The system is a less expensive and more secure online commerce experience for all participants that reach through a global blockchain-based inventory system. Spectrum users will save time and money through its automated e-commerce functions.
